entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
